original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 17.21. Vedanāttika, Kusalattika
analyzed: vedanā attika kusala attika

original: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya
analyzed: paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ ca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ ca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti

original: hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: hetu paccayā satta

original: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Hetuyā cuddasa, adhipatiyā cuddasa …pe… avigate cuddasa.
analyzed: hetuyā cuddasa adhipatiyā cuddasa pe avigate cuddasa

original: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
analyzed: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta

original: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Ekavīsati pañhā.)
analyzed: adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā satta ekavīsati pañhā

original: Hetuyā adhipatiyā ekavīsati …pe… avigate ekavīsati.
analyzed: hetuyā adhipatiyā ekavīsati pe avigate ekavīsati

original: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto abyākato dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ abyākataḥ dhammaḥ na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa na abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Ārammaṇe ekavīsati, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare cha …pe… upanissaye ekavīsati, natthiyā
analyzed: ārammaṇe ekavīsati adhipatiyā dasa anantare cha pe upanissaye ekavīsati natthiyā

original: vigate cha. (Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaabyākatamūlaṁ adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: vigate cha dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutta abyākata mūlam adukkham asukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayuttaabyākatamūlampi kātabbaṁ.)
analyzed: sampayutta abyākata mūlam pi
